issue.title: [C++] Introduce SchemaBuilder companion class and Field::IsCompatibleWith
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7379](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7379). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The methods verifies if fields/schemas are compatible with regards to naming and type. This is a partly extracted from `UnifySchemas`.
